StringTable.Label: Unit_Transport_Dec
StringTable.String: Send this citizen to another core world in an unarmed transport ship.

StringTable.Label: Unit_Cull_Dec
StringTable.String: Execute this citizen to eliminate weakness from the Civilization, or just to make an example of them.

StringTable.Label: Unit_GenocideBatteries_Dec
StringTable.String: Convert this citizen into a Neural Network Battery. This will produce a small burst of Stored Goods and Research.[BR][BR]Citizens converted into a Neural Network Battery don't contribute to your planet and don't affect your planet's [HS=HS_Military]Approval[/HS]
